com.netflix.genie.server.metrics

Class JobCountMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.netflix.genie.server.metrics.JobCountMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class JobCountMonitor
extends java.lang.Thread
    Monitor thread that routinely updates the statistics object.
